package.description: VS Code extension to easily run Cucumber Feature files in Java projects

config.title: Cucumber Java Easy Runner
config.enableCodeLens: Enable CodeLens buttons in feature files. When disabled, use Test Explorer for a cleaner interface.
config.autoCompileMaven: Run 'mvn compile test-compile' before running tests. Enable if you want the extension to auto-compile your project.
config.additionalGluePaths: Extra glue paths (Java packages) containing step definitions. Useful when steps are in shared libraries.
config.excludeBuildDirectories: Directories excluded when discovering feature files to avoid duplicates.
config.logLevel: Controls the verbosity of extension logs shown in VS Code Output panel.

extension.inlineButtonsDisabled: Inline buttons disabled - use Test Explorer instead

errors.openFeatureFile: Please open or select a feature file.
errors.featureFilesOnly: This command only works with .feature files.
errors.rightClickScenario: Please right-click inside a Scenario or Scenario Outline.
errors.rightClickExample: Please right-click on a data row (starting with |) in an Examples table.
errors.exampleNotDetected: Example row not detected. Please right-click on a data row (starting with |, not the header row) in an Examples table.
errors.noWorkspaceFolder: Feature file is not inside a workspace.
errors.gluePathNotSpecified: Glue path not specified, operation cancelled.
errors.debugFailed: Failed to start debug session. Make sure you have the Java debugger extension installed.
errors.testSessionFailed: Failed to start test session. Make sure you have the Java debugger extension installed.

prompts.gluePath: Enter glue path for steps directory (e.g. org.example.steps)

testResults.checkTerminal: Test failed. Check terminal for details.
testResults.checkDebugConsole: Test failed. Check debug console for details.

tooltips.runFeature: Click to run the entire feature file
tooltips.debugFeature: Click to debug the entire feature file
tooltips.runExample: Click to run this example row
tooltips.debugExample: Click to debug this example row

dynamic.compilingFeatures: Compiling project and resolving dependencies for {0} feature(s)...
